languages.text: {n}От вашего прикосновения символ разделяется на три таких же — одновременно одинаковых, но различных. Перед вашим лицом проступает послание:{/n} "Владыка, третья казнь Их — расслоение, — не обличима в понимание, посему измолвляю себе вопрос, рождающий ясность".

traits.locale_text: {n}Стоит ладони коснуться символа, как он разделяется на три таких же — одновременно одинаковых, но различных. Перед вашим лицом проступает послание:{/n} "Владыка, третья казнь Звездных Богов — расслоение. Ее трудно облечь в понимание, посему я измолвлю вопрос".

languages.text: {n}The symbol you touched splits into three that are akin to it, similar and yet different from one another. A message materialises in front of you:{/n} "My Lord, Their third plague, the Unravelling, is beyond comprehension; therefore I put before myself a question bearing clarity."
languages.original_text: {n}От вашего прикосновения символ разделяется на три таких же — одновременно одинаковых, но различных. Перед вашим лицом проступает послание:{/n} "Владыка, третья казнь Их — расслоение, — не обличима в понимание, посему измолвляю себе вопрос, рождающий ясность".

traits.locale_text: {n}The symbol you touched splits into three that are like it: similar and yet different from one another. A message materialises in front of your face.{/n} "My Lord, Their third plague, the Unravelling, is beyond comprehension; therefore I put before myself a question from which clarity will be born."

{n}The symbol you touched splits into three that are like it: similar and yet different from one another. A message materialises in front of your face.{/n} "My Lord, Their third plague, the Unravelling, is beyond comprehension; therefore I put before myself a question from which clarity will be born."

{n}The symbol you touched splits into three that are akin to it, similar and yet different from one another. A message materialises in front of you:{/n} "My Lord, Their third plague, the Unravelling, is beyond comprehension; therefore I put before myself a question bearing clarity."

{n}The symbol you touched splits into three that are akin to it, similar and yet different from one another. A message materialises in front of you:{/n} "My Lord, Their third plague, the Unravelling, is beyond comprehension; therefore I put before myself a question bearing clarity."

{n}The symbol you touched splits into three that are akin to it, similar and yet different from one another. A message materialises in front of you:{/n} "My Lord, Their third plague, the Unravelling, is beyond comprehension; therefore I put before myself a question bearing clarity."

{n}The symbol you touched splits into three that are akin to it, similar and yet different from one another. A message materialises in front of you:{/n} "My Lord, Their third plague, the Unravelling, is beyond comprehension; therefore I put before myself a question bearing clarity."

languages.text: {n}El símbolo que has tocado se divide en tres parecidos, que a pesar de su similitud son diferentes. Un mensaje se materializa ante ti:{/n} «Mi Señor, su tercera plaga, la Anulación, está más allá de toda comprensión. Por eso me planteo una pregunta para restaurar la claridad».
languages.original_text: {n}The symbol you touched splits into three that are akin to it, similar and yet different from one another. A message materialises in front of you:{/n} "My Lord, Their third plague, the Unravelling, is beyond comprehension; therefore I put before myself a question bearing clarity."

traits.locale_text: {n}El símbolo que has tocado se divide en tres parecidos, que a pesar de su similitud son diferentes. Un mensaje se materializa ante ti:{/n} «Mi Señor, su tercera plaga, la Anulación, está más allá de toda comprensión. Por eso me planteo una pregunta para restaurar la claridad».

languages.text: {n}Le symbole que vous avez touché se divise en trois parties à la fois semblables et différentes, puis un message se matérialise sous vos yeux :{/n} « Mon seigneur. Leur troisième fléau, l'Effondrement, dépasse l'entendement. Je me permets donc de vous soumettre une question pour vous éclairer. »
languages.original_text: {n}The symbol you touched splits into three that are akin to it, similar and yet different from one another. A message materialises in front of you:{/n} "My Lord, Their third plague, the Unravelling, is beyond comprehension; therefore I put before myself a question bearing clarity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le symbole que vous avez touché se divise en trois parties à la fois semblables et différentes, puis un message se matérialise sous vos yeux :{/n} « Mon seigneur. Leur troisième fléau, l'Effondrement, dépasse l'entendement. Je me permets donc de vous soumettre une question pour vous éclairer. »

languages.text: {n}触れたシンボルは、似て非なる三つのシンボルへと分裂した。目の前にメッセージが現れる。{/n}「主よ、彼らの第三の疫病の解明は、理解の範疇を超えたものです。そこで、私は自らに明確な疑問を提示いたします」
languages.original_text: {n}The symbol you touched splits into three that are akin to it, similar and yet different from one another. A message materialises in front of you:{/n} "My Lord, Their third plague, the Unravelling, is beyond comprehension; therefore I put before myself a question bearing clarity."

traits.locale_text: {n}触れたシンボルは、似て非なる三つのシンボルへと分裂した。目の前にメッセージが現れる。{/n}「主よ、彼らの第三の疫病の解明は、理解の範疇を超えたものです。そこで、私は自らに明確な疑問を提示いたします」

languages.text: {n}你触碰到的符号突然分裂成了三个相似的符号，但彼此之间又各不相同。金属板上浮现出了新的信息。{/n}“我的主，我无法理解他们提到的第三种灾祸：解体。因此，我向我自己提出了这个问题，用来理解这种灾祸。”
languages.original_text: {n}The symbol you touched splits into three that are akin to it, similar and yet different from one another. A message materialises in front of you:{/n} "My Lord, Their third plague, the Unravelling, is beyond comprehension; therefore I put before myself a question bearing clarity."

traits.locale_text: {n}你触碰到的符号突然分裂成了三个相似的符号，但彼此之间又各不相同。金属板上浮现出了新的信息。{/n}“我的主，我无法理解他们提到的第三种灾祸：解体。因此，我向我自己提出了这个问题，用来理解这种灾祸。”

languages.text: {n}Das Symbol, das du berührst, spaltet sich in drei verwandte Symbole auf, alle ganz ähnlich und doch alle anders. Eine Nachricht erscheint vor dir:{/n} "Herr, ihre dritte Seuche, die Auftrennung, übersteigt jedes Verständnis. Ich stelle mir daher eine Frage voller Klarheit."
languages.original_text: {n}The symbol you touched splits into three that are akin to it, similar and yet different from one another. A message materialises in front of you:{/n} "My Lord, Their third plague, the Unravelling, is beyond comprehension; therefore I put before myself a question bearing clarity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Symbol, das du berührst, spaltet sich in drei verwandte Symbole auf, alle ganz ähnlich und doch alle anders. Eine Nachricht erscheint vor dir:{/n} "Herr, ihre dritte Seuche, die Auftrennung, übersteigt jedes Verständnis. Ich stelle mir daher eine Frage voller Klarheit."

languages.text: {n}Dokunduğun sembol, ona ve birbirlerine benzeyen ama yine de farklı olan üç sembole ayrılıyor. Önünde bir mesaj beliriyor.{/n} "Lordum; Onların üçüncü vebası olan Çözülme, algı ötesi bir şey. Dolayısıyla netlik kazandıracak bir soruyu kendi önüme koyuyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The symbol you touched splits into three that are akin to it, similar and yet different from one another. A message materialises in front of you:{/n} "My Lord, Their third plague, the Unravelling, is beyond comprehension; therefore I put before myself a question bearing clarity."
